mapper.select: SELECT *, timestampdiff(hour, wDate, now()) as hour_diff, datediff(now(), wDate) as date_diff, (select count(*) from board2Reply where board2Idx=b.idx) as replyCnt FROM board2 b where ${search} like concat("%",#{searchString},"%") ORDER BY idx DESC limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from board2 where ${search} like concat("%",#{searchString},"%");

select.if: select idx,title from board2 where idx < #{idx} order by idx desc limit 1;
select idx,title from board2 where idx > #{idx} order by idx limit 1;

mapper.select: select * from board2Reply where board2Idx = #{idx} order by re_order;
select * from board2Reply where board2Idx = #{board2Idx} order by re_order desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update board2 set readNum = readNum + 1 where idx = #{idx};
update board2 set good = good + 1 where idx = #{idx};
update board2Reply set re_order = re_order + 1 where board2Idx=#{board2Idx} and re_order > #{re_order};
update board2Reply set content = #{vo.content} where idx=#{vo.idx};
